1.title: Advance to Trafalgar Square. If you pass Go, collect £200.

2.title: Advance to Pall Mall. If you pass Go, collect £200.

3.title: Advance token to nearest Utility. If unowned, you may buy it from the Bank. If owned, throw dice and pay owner a total 10 times the amount thrown.

4.title: Advance token to the nearest Railroad and pay owner twice the rental to which he/she is otherwise entitled. If Railroad is unowned, you may buy it from the Bank.

6.title: Get out of Jail Free. This card may be kept until needed, or traded/sold.

8.title: Go to Jail. Go directly to Jail. Do not pass GO, do not collect £200.

9.title: Make general repairs on all your property: For each house pay £25, For each hotel pay £100.

11.title: Take a trip to King's Cross Station.

12.title: Take a walk on the Mayfair. Advance token to Mayfair.

13.title: You have been elected Chairman of the Board. Pay each player £50.
